snippet: Wanting to avoid further federal oversight, MetLife will no longer originate home mortgages.
abstract: MetLife announces that it will close its home mortgage-origination operation in effort to avoid further federal oversight, costing the company at least $90 million and resulting in a likely loss of as many as 4,300 jobs.
lead_paragraph: Wanting to avoid further federal oversight, MetLife will no longer originate home mortgages.
